name: Configfiles
body:
# ConfigFiles
configuration file of popular softwares

1. lighttpd  
 * 简单配置
 * 配合php-fpm
2. squid3  
 * 隐藏代理，不让目标网站获取真实的机器ip
3. vim  
 * vim基本配置
4. zsh
 * zsh基本配置  
5. pac  
自动代理文件存档
 * xduotai.pac  
xduotai提供给付费用户的pac，特点是文件小，而且站点匹配比较精确智能
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
